extendedInfo.description: Search INSIDE documents/files as you type.Featuring sub second, full text, Desktop Search in files content, and over apps names and description. Similar To Spotlight on IOS, or Google Now on Android.KEY FEATURES:â  Files Search - by name, extension, and full text search inside PDF, MS OFFICE, and Open Office.â Recently Modified Files View - Care about recent files like pictures you took today, files you downloaded a minute ago, a document you recently edited? See them regardless of the folder they're in, with the innovative fast flat view of all files in the device SD card, sorted by when they were modified â  Apps Search - Search the apps you have installed by name, and in appsâ description on Google Play (Search  "game" to see all the games you have installed).â  Instant Search: watch sub-second results come in as you type.â Recently Installed Apps View - So you could easily get to the app you installed two days ago but can't remember its name.â  Find in files By Metadata - Search Office documents, Music songs, and video files by Author, Title, Artist, Album. supported files format: PDF, DOC, DOCX, ODT, EPUB, FB2, MP3, MP4. Perfect for the on the go lawyer, business man, or student.â  Andro Search has no commercials.

reviews.title: sensacional! recomendo!.
reviews.comment: indexa quase tudo! voc\303\252 digita uma palavra e imediatamente uma lista dos arquivos \303\251 exibida inclusive nos pdfs. ap\303\263s instala\303\247\303\243o demora um pouco para registrar tudo. depois atualiza automaticamente. achei bom. senti falta do acesso a um pendrive externo (samsung note II) acesso root. seria bom ter op\303\247\303\243o de config.

reviews.comment: The app is already useful as it is, but if the developer would incorporate contacts search functionality, I will rate it 5 stars!

reviews.title: Doesnt support fb2 and mobi
reviews.comment: It\'s useless,there is only support for epub file format and most ebooks I have found have fb2 format. It poorely customizable,very is no possibility to add a new file format for e.G. to write an extension/plugin for fb2 support. Is it apache lucene based? Feedback button doesn\'t work at all and where is no possibility to write complex search requests. Indexing process is slow and doest work asyncron in the background. Good try,but still needs some rework.
